webwork-tex.solution:
\par \par {\bf Solution: }\par SOLUTION \par
\[\frac{\partial z}{\partial x}=\frac{\partial}{\partial x}\left[\left(x^{5}+x-y\right)^{7}\right] = 7\!\left(x^{5}+x-y\right)^{6}\!\left(5x^{4}+1\right).\]
\[\frac{\partial z}{\partial y}=\frac{\partial}{\partial y}\left[\left(x^{5}+x-y\right)^{7}\right] = -7\!\left(x^{5}+x-y\right)^{6}.\]
\par
